H4BasicMod_releaseNotes:
1.Heroes
We added 11 Specialty Heroes, and 6 new Specialties:
1)Completed Block Specialty hero in all factions
Calistar(Chaos) , Grum(Order) and Theritos(Nature) possess this Specialty
If you forget what Block Specialty is, just check out the reference before

New Specialties:
1)Normal Necromancy Specialty - Hero's Necromancy EXP + (Skill_Lv*100)+(10*Hero_Level), Double the conversion rate.
Norticus(Death) and Baenefa(Death) possess this Specialty
2)Special Necromancy Specialty - Gains 2.5% Basic Necromancy EXP and +1 conversion rate for every level up.
Vidomina(Death) possesses this Specialty
Note: Normal Necromancy is stronger in the early stage game; on the contrary, the Special one is in the late game. The Critical Point is 40 Level.

3)Potion Specialty - Starting Spells:4 potion spells(Cold Resistance, Fire Resistance, Strength, Speed); 
Minasli(Order) and Gurvilin(Order) possess this Specialty
Note: Can cast [Strength] and [Speed] spells on Adventure Map.

4)Charm Specialty - Charm EXP +2.5% * Hero_Level
No hero possesses this Specialty, but player can customize this Specialty for some heroes(more Custom System information below)

Other Specialty Heroes:
1)Baron Von Tarkin - Increase the effectiveness of Death spells by 50%
2)Mysterio - Starting Spells:Immortality potion(can cast on adventure map); Increase the effectiveness of Order spells by 50%
3)Emilia - Increase the effectiveness of Illusion Spells by 2.5% per level

Other Specialty Changed:
Gold Specialty - Produces gold 100*Hero_Level pre day -> 350+100*(Hero_Level-1)

2.Necromancy System Changed:
Master Skill - Removed Gargoyle
Grandmaster Skill - Allows raising Dark Champion
Require Changed - Raising Vampire only requires a level 2(or higher) creature corpses; Bone Dragon and Dark Champion requires a level 3(or higher) creature corpses.
Undead Transformer - The Hydra can tansform to Bone Dragon
25 Hydra -> 23 Bone Dragon（Rate-25:23）

4.Custom Hero Specialty System:
Now, Player can customize the ability for their hero without a Specialty, just use Basic_H4Launcher v1.07.exe
